abstract: Background Medication costs and their impact on patients are challenging to infer in real-world practice. We propose a pragmatic approach that leverages EHR medication data and a novel natural language processing (NLP) approach to define …

title: IDENTIFYING POSTPARTUM HYPERTENSION USING ELECTRONIC HEALTH RECORD DATA
details: D Brown, M Zhao, LD Levine, J Cohen, J Chen… - Journal of the American …, 2025
abstract: Background Electronic health record (EHR) data can be used to define hypertension (HTN) population estimates and identify untreated patients. However, validated EHR- based HTN definitions exclude pregnant patients. We aimed to create and validate a …
